## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
data <- read.csv('/Users/andrewnguyen/Downloads/starbucks_locations.csv')
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
nearest_stores <- function(lat, lon, data, N = 5) {
  # Euclidean distance in the same lat/lon coordinate system
  dists <- sqrt((data$Latitude - lat)^2 + (data$Longitude - lon)^2)
  
  # Rank by distance
  idx <- order(dists)[1:min(N, nrow(data))]
  
  out <- data.frame(
    store.name = data$Store.Name[idx],
    latitude   = data$Latitude[idx],
    longitude  = data$Longitude[idx],
    distance   = dists[idx]
  )
  
  return(out)
}


print(nearest_stores(12,45,data,12))

```
